name: The Survivor(Evil Village)
description:
Thank you for playing this game.

Prototype for a zombie survival game, tested on a laptop with RTX3050. This game is heavy.   Run "Prototype.exe" to play the game.

(The file is compressed in 7zip. 

 You will need 7Zip software to decompress the file.

 Please download the software from "MicrosoftStore" or other sources.)

Other Map (Prototype: Dark Cave)

("DarkCave" will be updated soon.)

-----Controls-----

W/A/S/D Key:  Move

Mouse Left Click:  Shoot

Mouse Right Click:  Push Aside

Mouse Scroll Wheel:  Switch Weapon

R Key:  Reload

Space Key:  Jump

Esc key:  Show Mouse Cursor

Pause key:  Pause

--------------------

(Unity 2021.3.15)
